questions.questionTitle: Where is this conversation most likely taking place?
What position does the woman hold?
What does the woman suggest that the man do?

script:
� Excuse me, please. Do you have these Brooksbury trousers in size 38?
� I'm sorry, but we're out of size 38 in Brooksbury. We do have 38s in Foster trousers. They're 100 percent cotton, very comfortable and stylish. Would you like to try on a pair of those?
� Hmm, all right. How about these Brooksbury shirts? Do you have any larges in blue?
� I'm afraid not. We have Foster larges in blue. Why don't you try one of those to match your pants?
